constants.constant: SELECT TechnicalRequest WHERE org_id = :contact->org_id AND caller_id = :contact->id

field.filter: SELECT Person AS p JOIN lnkPersonToTeam AS t ON t.person_id = p.id JOIN Team AS t2 ON t.team_id=t2.id WHERE t2.name = "Werkplaatsen"

properties.comment: /** * Persistent classes for a CMDB * * @copyright Copyright (C) 2010-2012 Combodo SARL * @license http://opensource.org/licenses/AGPL-3.0 */

field.filter: SELECT Service AS s JOIN lnkCustomerContractToService AS l1 ON l1.service_id=s.id JOIN CustomerContract AS cc ON l1.customercontract_id=cc.id WHERE cc.org_id = :this->org_id AND s.status != 'obsolete'
SELECT ServiceSubcategory WHERE service_id = :this->service_id AND status != 'obsolete'
SELECT TechnicalRequest WHERE id != :this->id AND status NOT IN ('rejected','resolved','closed')

method.comment: /** * To be deprecated: use SetCurrentDate() instead * @return void */
/** * To be deprecated: use SetCurrentDate() instead * @return void */
/** * To be deprecated: use SetCurrentDate() and SetElapsedTime() instead * @return void */
/** * To be deprecated: use SetCurrentDate() instead * @return void */
/** * To be deprecated: use SetCurrentUser() instead * @return void */
/** * Cascade the resolution to child User Request * @return true (returning false would stop the ongoing transition) */
/** * Resolve the ticket from another resolved ticket * @return void */

dashlet.title: UI:WelcomeMenu:MyCalls
dashlet.query: SELECT TechnicalRequest AS i WHERE i.agent_id = :current_contact_id AND status NOT IN ("closed", "resolved")
SELECT TechnicalRequest WHERE reminder < DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND status NOT IN ('resolved', 'closed')

dashlet.title: Overzichtkaart
dashlet.query: SELECT TechnicalRequest WHERE status NOT IN ('resolved', 'closed')

dashlet.title: UI-RequestManagementOverview-Last-14-days
dashlet.query: SELECT TechnicalRequest WHERE DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) < start_date

dashlet.title: Meldingen in de laatste maand
dashlet.query: SELECT TechnicalRequest WHERE start_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')AND start_date > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')

dashlet.title: Meldingen in de laatste 6 maanden
dashlet.query: SELECT TechnicalRequest WHERE start_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')AND start_date > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')

dashlet.title: Meldingen in het laatste jaar
dashlet.query: SELECT TechnicalRequest WHERE start_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')AND start_date > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')

dashlet.title: UI-RequestManagementOverview-OpenRequestByAgent
dashlet.query: SELECT TechnicalRequest WHERE status NOT IN ('closed','resolved','rejected')

dashlet.title: Tickets per status
dashlet.query: SELECT TechnicalRequest WHERE status NOT IN ('rejected')

dashlet.title: UI-RequestManagementOverview-OpenRequestByCustomer
dashlet.query: SELECT TechnicalRequest WHERE status NOT IN ('closed','resolved','rejected')

menu.oql: SELECT TechnicalRequest WHERE agent_id = :current_contact_id AND status NOT IN ("closed","resolved")
SELECT TechnicalRequest WHERE status NOT IN ("closed","resolved")
